Type: object

root portfolio
Type: object

Definition for PACTA portfolio object

 No Additional Properties

root portfolio files
Type: array of string

List of portfolio files to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root portfolio files files items
Type: string

Path to the file.

root portfolio holdingsDate
Type: enum (of string)Format: date

Date of the holdings data.

Must be one of:

  • "2022-12-31"
  • "2023-12-31"

root portfolio name
Type: string

Name of the portfolio.

root analysis
Type: object

Analysis parameters.

root analysis equityMarketList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of equity markets to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root analysis equityMarketList equityMarketList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "DevelopedMarket"
  • "EmergingMarket"
  • "GlobalMarket"

root analysis scenarioGeographiesList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario geographies to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root analysis scenarioGeographiesList scenarioGeographiesList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Global"
  • "GlobalAggregate"
  • "NonOECD"
  • "OECD"

root analysis scenarioSourcesList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario sources to be used.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root analysis scenarioSourcesList scenarioSourcesList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "GECO2022"
  • "GECO2023"
  • "ISF2021"
  • "ISF2023"
  • "WEO2022"
  • "WEO2023"

root analysis sectorList
Type: array of enum (of string)

List of PACTA sectors to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root analysis sectorList sectorList items
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Automotive"
  • "Aviation"
  • "Cement"
  • "Coal"
  • "Oil&Gas"
  • "Power"
  • "Steel"

root analysis startYear
Type: integer

Start year of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 2022

root analysis timeHorizon
Type: integer

Time horizon of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 1

Additional Properties of any type are allowed.
